subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Aramis Ramirez has been stuck in a season-long slump, but he had three hits, including an eighth-inning home run, to lead the Cubs past the Phillies, 4-3.
snippet: Aramis Ramirez has been stuck in a season-long slump, but he had three hits, including an eighth-inning home run, to lead the Cubs past the Phillies, 4-3.
